Generated Narrative: SearchParameter Encounter-subject-family

EncounterSubjectfamilySearchParameter

Parameter subject.family:string

Searches for Encounter based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?subject:Patient.family={familyName}
ResourceEncounter
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesEncounter
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: EncounterSubjectfamilySearchParameter
description: Searches for Encounter based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?subject:Patient.family={familyName}
